idea-plugin.name: Wrap to Column
idea-plugin.description: Wrap selected text to the specified column width. Similar to the Emacs command 'Fill Paragraph' and Vim's `gq` (format lines) command. A replacement for the native Intellij Fill Paragraph command, which hasn't ever worked correctly for me.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.1.3
  • Stop adding an erroneous leading space if the first line of the selection is a newline/carriage return.
  • Detect the period "." as a bullet point indentation.
0.1.2
  • Fix plugin for Windows users
0.1.1
  • Better support for multi-line C-style comments.
0.1
  • Initial commit.

action.description: Wrap selected text to the currently configured column width.
